result.purpose: Responsible for defining a command handling system and implementing a command-line interface for analyzing a repository's structure and configuration.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating command handling and REPL functionalities in separate files, promoting separation of concerns.

cli/commands.go.purpose: Defines a command handling system with various command implementations.

cli/repl.go.purpose: Implements a command-line interface (CLI) for analyzing a repository's structure and configuration.
side_effects: Reads user input from the command line
Modifies the state of the REPL instance
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if API keys are mishandled
File system access may lead to unauthorized access if not properly validated
